name: xorlunr
description: An extremely lightweight WASM based full-text search engine for offline search, using xor_filters.
author: Matthew Pope

scripts.build:emscripten: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src -u $(id -u):$(id -g) emscripten/emsdk emcc src/xor_builder.c -Os -s WASM=1 -o build/xor_builder.js
scripts.build: npm run build:emscripten && npm run build:app
